sentences.sContent: Small firms with slipshod standards are being replaced by bigger, better ones. Where people are creating companies, they are doing so out of choice, not economic necessity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Small firms with slipshod standards are being replaced by bigger, better ones. Where people are creating companies, they are doing so out of choice, not economic necessity.
sentences.sCn: 在某些层面上看这是一个好消息，那些不认真奉行标准的小公司正在被更大，更好的公司取代，在哪里创办公司将基于个人的选择而不再是经济的需要。

synos.tran: 潦草的；穿著不整洁的；穿著踏跟鞋的
